title: Dallas Mavericks' Luka Doncic gets 16th technical foul of season, faces 1-game ban - ESPN
content: Dallas Mavericks' Luka Doncic gets 16th technical foul of season, faces 1-game ban  ESPN
description: Dallas Mavericks star Luka Doncic received his 16th technical foul of the season during Friday's game against the Trail Blazers, which would mean a one-game suspension unless the league rescinds it.
